G

game - Variable in class edu.byu.rpg.screens.ScreenBase
Local instance of game (for access to the game's RpgGame.assets, RpgGame.batch, RpgGame.engine)
getMap(String) - Method in class edu.byu.rpg.tools.Assets
Used to retrieve a pre-loaded TMX map.
getTexture(String) - Method in class edu.byu.rpg.tools.Assets
Used to retrieve a pre-loaded Texture.
